name: Soul Farmer
description:
Simple shooter in the style of a game-boy.

Updates:

New design for :- Character, gun, and enemy.

Two enemies now spawn.

Added sound effects and music.

Key binds:

Space - Shoot.

Double click screen - start gameplay.

Arrow keys - Move.

Made for the Top Down game jam.

Scoring:

Coins - 5 points 

Kill enemy - 1 point
